description: This course surveys the history of France since 1774, tracing elements of stability and upheaval
from the Old Regime to the Fifth Republic. Emphasis is on the revolutionary tradition and the
development of republicanism, social history of the 19th century, de Gaulle and his legacy, the
Socialist experiment, and contemporary challenges facing a pluralistic society within a unitary
state tradition. Foreign Language Across the Curriculum course available in French.  Offered
